title: Grok â€” AI Tool Review
description: Grok is xAI's AI assistant with real-time X/Twitter data access, known for its witty personality and willingness to discuss controversial topics. Grok is the AI assistant developed by Elon Musk's xAI company, available to X Premium subscribers. It has unique real-time access to posts on X (formerly Twitter), making it invaluable for social media trend analysis. Grok 2 and Grok 3 are highly competitive with GPT-4 and Claude, with Grok known for fewer content restrictions than other AI assistants. Highlights: Real-time X/Twitter data access. Less restrictive content filters. Grok 3 is highly capable. Image understanding. Witty, personality-driven responses.
